summary: SUN VISOR FLOPS DOWN OBSTRUCTING DRIVER'S VIEW.  THIS IS A KNOWN DEFECT AND TOYOTA ISSUED AN EXTENDED WARRANTY COVERAGE FOR 7 YEARS OF WARRANTY REPAIR.  HOWEVER, MY VISOR FAILED 3 1/2 MONTHS AFTER THE EXTENSION EXPIRED AND THE LOCAL DEALER AND TOYOTA AMERICA REFUSED TO PAY FOR THE REPAIR.      THE VISOR FLOPS DOWN AND WILL NOT STAY UP.  IT OBSCURES THE DRIVER'S VISION.
